Swallows and Amazons

23.7m, (78') - Sleeps 8 Guests

  • Browse
  • Overview
  • Photos
  • Specifications
  • Request Information

Home › All Yachts › Swallows and Amazons

Delivered by CNB Bordeaux from the design board of naval architect Philippe Briand, SWALLOWS & AMAZONS has excellent sailing pedigree. Finished to the highest specifications the sleek lines and fresh modern interior of SWALLOWS & AMAZONS make her a superb charter yacht, now available for charter from Cap d'Agde for sailing in South of France and Corsica.

The stunning design of this yacht will enhance your charter experience whether you're reclining on deck with a cocktail, flying along on a beam reach, or gazing at her from your beachside barbeque

The deck of SWALLOWS & AMAZONS was designed to keep the yacht easy to handle and uncluttered so the yacht gives you maximum sailing pleasure in luxury and comfort. For water sports choose from snorkeling, wake boarding and water skiing or fishing, when you head ashore you can make use of the beach games.

The interior of SWALLOWS & AMAZONS is modern and features an incredible amount of light creating a sense of space in the open-plan saloon. The interior is complemented by fine linens and all the finishing touches of a luxury hotel, without having compronmised on CNB's infamous sailing capabilities.She is air-conditioned throughout and the saloon can be an ideal retreat from the sun. The yacht can cater for eight guests in three double cabins and one twin cabin that can be converted to a double if needed.

The friendly professional crew of three and the highly experienced captain and chef will ensure you have a memorable stay on board.
